dcterms:creator: Ivan Potyashin
Mariam Kaprielova
dcterms:description: The HWR200 dataset represents a comprehensive resource for the advancement of machine learning applications in the domain of handwritten text analysis. It consists of a collection of Russian handwritten text images, meticulously curated to facilitate a diverse range of research tasks, including character and handwriting recognition, visual question answering, near-duplicate detection, and text reuse identification.
dcterms:title: HWR200

dcterms:description: The School Notebooks Dataset constitutes a specialized corpus of images depicting school notebooks filled with handwritten notes in Russian. This dataset is designed to foster the development of advanced detection and Optical Character Recognition (OCR) models, providing comprehensive annotations that enable end-to-end text recognition from page images.
dcterms:title: School_notebooks_RU

dcterms:description: The Student Essays dataset is an internally curated corpus designed to advance Handwriting Detection and Recognition models. It comprises handwritten essays authored by students practicing writing essays, providing a consistent framework for OCR analysis.
dcterms:title: Student Essays Dataset
